channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Human fouling, 18th August
item.description:
**2nd time of reporting** Human excrement on magazine on pavement opposite garage 16 for about 4 days. Children play here and people walk their dogs. The dense foliage overhanging the pavement encourages people to use it as a latrine, please could you arrange for foliage to be trimmed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poplar Place, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leak from pipe on the top floor, 18th August
item.description:
Water coming out from a pipe on the top floor. It reaches the floor and splatters the cars, bins, even people. The water also gets into the building and leaks from floor to floor. This can be dangerous with electrical appliances which reside inside it.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woodberry Down Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Fence broken, 18th August
item.description:

item.title: Dead Tree, 18th August
item.description:
There is a very large dead tree on the pavement. It looks dead and the roots are lifting. This is a very busy road for local traffic, school children and residential houses nearby. This tree looks like it could be a hazard if it were to fall on the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bickley Road, Bickley, London

item.title: Unfortunately starting from Peckham road on junction with Kelly Avenue is constantly getting full of rubbish all over the place, 18th August
item.description:
Unfortunately for some reason council streets cleaning services are not working thoroughly all the time. We shouldn't complain about dirty and messy streets all the time. Council streets cleaning services should work responsibly and caring about the very good quality cleaning of public streets. On Kelly Avenue starting from the pharmacy Peckham road through Kelly Avenue it's constantly full of rubbish on grounds between pavements and road starting from Lister Care Centre. Can you please ask the council streets cleaning team to work in professional manner and thorough attitude towards their job obligations and to deliver very good quality cleaning services all the time all over Southwark council, so that we don't have to make complaints about dirty and messy public streets and areas in our council.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelly Avenue, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracked road surface around manhole cover, 18th August
item.description:
Riney doing another job in this road shortly already marked up. Could this manhole cover area be considered for patching up please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Avenue, Elmstead, London

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 18th August
item.description:
7925209 - Previous log no. I reported this vehicle a number of weeks ago and was informed the responsibility fell on orbit, having contacted them and been passed back n forth, they are not responsible for that area. Could the log be revisited and the matter investigated as a matter of urgency. As previously stated, the vehicle has been in situ for 2 years, untaxed and causing an obstruction as well as risking the safety of local residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Twigg Close, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Request for Tree Pruning â€“ Branches Entering Property, 18th August
item.description:
I am writing to request tree pruning. A tree near my property has branches coming into my house, which means I cannot open my window. The branches are also bringing insects into my home.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colberg Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smashed up car blocking path, 18th August
item.description:

item.title: Car Abandoned on Millfields Road, 18th August
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Millfields Road, Hackney, London
